nodes.text: Garim Ayrvn was a Human male who had served as the warden of an Imperial prison facility until an assault team from the Alliance to Restore the Republic raided the complex, freeing all of the prisoners. Resigning in disgrace, Ayrvn became a bounty hunter, working for House Tresario, in order to fulfill his vow to recapture all of those that the Rebels had let loose. He became modestly successful at his new profession, though it remained doubtful whether or not he would be able to make good on his pledge. He was seen as moody and self-centered, constantly brooding on his failure and future goals.
